testcase.name: oradb::prepareautostart Linux Ubuntu should contain Exec[enable service oracle] with command => "update-rc.d oracle defaults", require => "File[/etc/init.d/oracle]", user => "root", unless => "ls /etc/rc3.d/*oracle | /bin/grep 'oracle'", path => "/usr/local/bin:/bin:/usr/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/sbin:/sbin" and logoutput => true
